00016 uint8_t *ndsScan(uint8_t degree) {
00017 
00018         uint8_t winkel = 0;
00019         static uint8_t points[180] = {};
00020 
00021         for(winkel = 0; winkel < 180; winkel = winkel + degree){
00022 
00023                 nds3_move(winkel);
00024 
00025                 //delay for the movement of the servo, more for the first move
00026                 if(winkel == 0){
00027                         delay(900);
00028                 }else {
00029                         delay(100);
00030                 }
00031 
00032                 //updating the coprozessor, to get the current value
00033                 copro_update();
00034                 points[winkel / degree] = nds3_get_dist();
00035         }
00036 
00037         nds3_move(90);
00038         return points;
00039 }
00040 
00044 void ndsScan_init(){
00045         i2c_init();
00046         nds3_move(90);
00047 }
